story_parts.text: A lion was walking through the jungle when he came to a clearing. In the clearing was a city. The lion had never seen a city before. He walked into the city and saw all the tall buildings and the people walking around. The lion liked the city and decided to stay there.
next_options: The lion roams the city and becomes its king
The lion is captured by humans and put in a zoo
story_parts.selected_option: The lion roams the city and becomes its king

story_parts.text: The lion roams the city and becomes its king. He is loved by the people and he rules the city with wisdom and strength. The lion is happy in his new home and he knows that he will never be alone again.
next_options: The lion continues to live happily in the city, ruling with wisdom and strength
The lion is challenged by a new lion who wants to take over the city

quiz_parts.question: Why does the lion leave the jungle?

options.1: To become king of the city
options.2: To be loved by the people
options.3: To rule the city with wisdom and strength
